channel.title: A Few Questions
channel.description:
Ok i have posted questions here yesterday and they did not get answered so i was going to see if anyone could answer them now,
Question 1: In my server how do i change around the home and move stuff into the home say i wanted the home at the place were you have to pop the balloons in runescape. how would i change that to home and how would i add banks, and stuff like that.
Question 2: how do you change the weather to lets say snowy so the ground is snowy or cant you do that ?
Question 3: how do you add pickup to servers.
When you answer the questions can you stat witch one you are answering please.

item.title: A Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @owndscape owndscape
item.description:
@owndscape wrote:

Edit it with notepad. Btw a good thing to use would get notepad++ it will help a lot when you start editing in client.java because it will show all the {} and most of the common mistakes are because you have forgotten one of those easy to remember symbols

Read full topic

item.title: A Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @Residence Residence
item.description:
@Residence wrote:

ok, how do open up cfg ?

Read full topic

item.title: A Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @owndscape owndscape
item.description:
@owndscape wrote:

Answer 1: Basically you find the login method and the coords you start at then change them to the place you want the players to start. To put bankers and shops go into autospawn.cfg and change the coordinates of the npcâ€™s that you want to fit your needed area.
Answer 2: I have no idea never needed Winter Before Sorry.
Answer 3: if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } } Just search "master: and above that one paste the pickup code and make sure to go into your character files and give yourself rights of 3

Read full topic
